<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, nice to meet you... I'm Lutz.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Were you looking
for me?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. What's the matter?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. How can I help you?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. What's the matter?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. What do you need
so late at night?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. What brings you
here this late at night?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>.

(no translation)

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's a lovely day today. Makes me feel like
climbing to the top of the world and just taking
in the view.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's raining today. That means we're not likely to
see any butterflies or dragonflies out and
about...

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's sunny today, isn't it? But since it's hot, I
can't play outside for very long, or my mother
will scold me.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's raining today. I bet there're a lot of frogs on
the riverbanks at the foot of the mountain.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Such perfect weather. Makes me feel like
climbing to the top of the world and just taking
in the view.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's raining today. That means we're not likely to
see any butterflies or dragonflies out and
about...

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's sunny today, isn't it? But since it's cold, I
can't play outside for very long, or my mother
will scold me.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's snowing! I hope it piles up so I can build a
snowman.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This typhoon sure is howling. Are you sure
you're up for walking around in this weather?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This snow is intense. Are you sure you're up for
walking around in it?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...There's a rumor going around town...
<PAGE>
Is it true you're dating someone?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
(no translation)

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I come here sometimes. I like watching all these
people from different countries come and go.
...I'm not here to see Melanie.
<PAGE>
Well, I'm not here JUST to see Melanie.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Pardon me, I'm busy studying. Come back later,
won't you?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I spend a lot of time in this forest, and
sometimes, I hear the leaves rustle without any
wind.
<PAGE>
Have you ever experienced something like that?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like coming here. There are all kinds of fun little
insects around.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The river over there is full of fish. I'd like to go
catch a few, but...my mother won't let me.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love a good walk in the forest. It's really fun to
watch the animals and insects.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
(no translation)

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear you can sometimes see rare butterflies
around here.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Who is using the field here? It must be tough for
them to walk this far.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Eda looks active for her age. She comes up here
to do some farm work every day...

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear you can see big beetles during the
summer.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can see this field's had a lot of hard work put
into it.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is Giorgio's flower garden, right? Wow, it's
amazing. No wonder why there are so many
insects around.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like it here. There are lots of fun insects
around.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you seen the ermines around here? They're
so cute! I love them.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fritz is working so hard on his farm, isn't he?
...Look at how many crops he's growing.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can see a lot of fireflies around here during
the summer.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This field must be convenient to work, being so
close to town.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, Elise is growing rice, huh? Rice is an
important staple food. Wheat, too.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like studying in general, but I especially like
studying insects and animals.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like studying in general, but I especially like
studying insects and animals.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you good at catching insects, by any
chance?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I'm not too good at catching them... People
keep making fun of me about it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But I am good at studying them, so maybe if
you can teach me to catch them, we can help
each other out.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is it fun to run a farm? Does your farm have any
animals?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>If you have a cow, I'd like to see it... I've never
seen a cow in my life.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I like studying... But to be honest, I'd rather play
with my father.
<PAGE>
I'd love to hike up the mountain with him and let
him teach me all about animals and insects...but
he's always too busy.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My father is always busy, so he gets home late.
<PAGE>
At least he doesn't work on Sundays, so we
always have a nice family dinner that night.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you know Melanie? She's the innkeeper's
daughter.
<PAGE>
I hang out with her a lot. She's good company,
even if she is kind of a dreamer.
<PAGE>
Can you believe she called ME a doofus,
though? ...You don't think I'm a doofus, do you?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you ever been to a foreign country?
<PAGE>
I only know this town, and another town close
by where I'm being tutored, so I want to know
more about other countries.
<PAGE>
I'd love to go on a family trip sometime... But
since my father's busy, that's not really possible,
is it?

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You talk to me a lot, but...don't I get boring?
<PAGE>
I mean, I like talking to you, but it's not like I
have any funny stories, or...
<PAGE>
At least, Melanie says they aren't funny. Or
interesting.
<PAGE>
She says my stories are always boring... Do you
know how to tell a good story, by any chance?
How do you make them entertaining?

Ah, this is <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>! It's my

it.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>

much!

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you're giving me this? I like it. Thank you
very much.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Is this for me? Thank you very much.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What? Is this for me...? Th-thank you very
much.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Whoa, you want to give me this...?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>N-no, it's nothing. I'll accept it. Thank you very
much.

<FACE_LUTZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Whoa, is that <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Um... I know it's a present from you, so I'll
accept it, but...just let me say that I really hate
these. A lot.
